Privacy Policy

This Chrome extension lets you dictate text with your voice. Your microphone audio is sent over HTTPS to the ElevenLabs Scribe API solely to obtain a text transcription. We do not collect, store, or share personal data. The audio is discarded as soon as transcription is complete. No analytics, no advertising, no third-party data sales.

Contact: ym422134@gmail.com
